exec: //Refresh the token if the time is passed 55 minutes, if the token doesn't exist, or if tokenTime doesn't exist
resolve('Existing Auth ticket is still valid');
console.error('Please select an environment from the dropdown menu in the top right.  A valid environment must contain an "appKey", "appSecret", "tenantId", and "siteId"');
console.log('Please correct any errors with your environment before proceeding.');
